get.description: This API lists all the layouts configured for a module.
This Api provides the standrd layout format for the given module with organisations fields that can be used for create layout

x-custom-parameters-attributes.descrption: Name of the module whose layouts must be fetched. The allowed values are !@tickets, contacts, accounts, calls, events, tasks, timeEntry, products, and contracts@!

post.description: This API creates new Layout by cloning existing layout.

get.description: This API is used to get the related list items (sub tab list) of a module.

This api behaves as below
(i)When Query param _fileType_=_CSV_ is passed the picklist values gets downloaded in csv file with _*fieldlabel*_ as its name
(ii) When header param is not passed _empty 200_ response

parameters.name: fileType
parameters.description: Export Format in which format should be shown.This value can be @CSV@

schema.description: Export Format in which format should be shown.This value can be @CSV@

get.description: This API fetches the logo set for a layout.

post.description: This API updates the logo set for a layout.

delete.description: This API removes the logo set for a layout.

get.description: This API fetches a layout configured for a module

patch.description: This API updates details of an existing layout.

post.description: This api activates the deactivated Layout.

get.summary: Get Layout Count for the Module and Department
get.description: This API gets layouts count details for a layout.

post.description: This API is to clone a field to other layouts.
This API process all the form rules for a given entity ID, module for that entity and fields and its new values

get.description: This api returns the profiles associated with a layout

patch.description: This api Associates the given profiles to the layout

get.description: This API fetches details of a layout, based on the profile of the current user.

get.summary: Get Unused Fields of a layout
get.description: This API gets the layout field

post.description:
This API replaces the old value with the new value for the PickList field type in all existing records only.

Note: When a value that does not exist in the PickList values is provided as new value, then this API will create the new value without deleting the old one.
